LP.title: IELTS Writing Helper | Manage your essays for IELTS writing tasks
LP.catch:
How do you manage your essays 
 for IELTS writing tasks?
LP.catchDescription: This app helps you manage your essays for IELTS writing tasks. From writing essays to reviewing essays, it's all taken care of.

detail.title: Problem Detail
detail.deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this problem?
detail.deleteConfirmDescription:
You can not undo this action. 
 The problem and essays associated with it will be permanently deleted.

create.title: Create Problem
create.limitAlertSnackbarTitle: You need to upgrade your plan to create more problems.
create.limitAlertTitle: You can not create a problem!
create.limitAlertContent1: In the free plan, you can save up to 10 questions.
create.limitAlertContent2: If you want to save more questions, please upgrade to the paid plan

form.title: Title
form.titleHelper: Page number & Name of text book
form.titlePlaceHolder: The Complete Guide to the IELTS P.29
form.question: Question
form.questionPlaceHolder: The chart below shows the number of men and women in further education in Britain in three periods and whether they were studying fulltime or part-time. Summarize the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.
form.imageHelper1: ※Upload a diagram image or a whole question image from textbook
form.imageHelper2: ※This file can be seen by other users
form.fileTypeError: Only image files supported. (extensions: png, gif, bmp, svg or jpg)
form.fileSizeError: File size must be less than 10MB
